CatDescriptText: Mr. Robert Bell, 454 Michigan Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 15, 1958, pg. 2 with question: "Should a woman, who has passed the age of 45, marry for the first time?" answer reads: "I think they should for companionshiop and security."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Robert Bell, wearing small moustache, plaid shirt, and striped zipper jacket, standing in front of marble wall between store windows with display of lamps and jewelry
